short.ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Bubbles Shooter is an untimed bubble-popping strategy game. You can play on Chrome™! Popup and Offline!
short.am: Bubbles Shooter is a funny game about basketball . You can play on Chrome™! Popup and Offline!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bubble Shooter is a genre of water bubble-popping shooting game. The player's mission is to move the arrow and break targets consisting of three or more balls of the same color. With proper tactics, you will be able to achieve victory. This game is incredibly enjoyable and relaxing. A must-try experience!
**Noted: I have a button (unblocked games) to make it easier for users to access and explore more games on my website.
